name: New Guinean Forest Wallaby
spread_note: Western New Guinea and some adjacent islands
image_alt: New Guinean Forest Wallaby, photo: Tomas Adamec, Prague Zoo
proportions: Body length 60–77 cm; tail length 46–53 cm; average weight 5 kg
reproduction: Females are pregnant for 30 days and bear 1 young
attractions: It is active at dusk and night. Males engage in ritualized fights during courtship.
